Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Welcome to Hangman Game â€”enjoy the fun Hangman Game directly from your new tab!
A nice way to pass time with this fun game at your fingertips.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Hangman Game extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.gethangman.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.gethangman.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.gethangman.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.gethangman.com/terms.html#terms-contact
About Us : http://www.gethangman.com/about.html

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
